keyFacts: The document lists key staff members for an entity related to LSJE, which handles purchasing, vendor payments, expense tracking, payroll, and contractor payments.
STC is identified as the Administration office for LSJE, indicating a structured organizational hierarchy.

The roles include legal (Attorney), financial (Accountants), managerial (Office Manager, Estate Manager, Project Manager), and technical (IT Manager) positions, suggesting a comprehensive operational structure.
